org.whispersystems.libsignal.ratchet

Class RootKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whispersystems.libsignal.ratchet.RootKey

  • public class RootKey
extends java.lang.Object
    The RootKey to perform KDF with DH. This RootKey is used to create a Root Chain

      • getKeyBytes

        public byte[] getKeyBytes()

      • createChain

        public Pair<RootKey,ChainKey> createChain(ECPublicKey theirRatchetKey,
                                          ECKeyPair ourRatchetKey)
                                   throws InvalidKeyException
        Create a new KDF Chain to solve the future secrecy problems.
        Parameters:
        theirRatchetKey - their public key to calculate a sharedSecret (DH)
        ourRatchetKey - our key pair to obtain private key to calculate a sharedSecret (DH)
        Returns:
        A new KDF Chain based on a newRootKey and a newChainKey pair.
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException
